GSD.description:
ALSA: seq: Fix data-race at module auto-loading

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 0a26889698d86dd0e76acbafa490c6582f88cba1. For more details please see the references link.
